item.title: CVE-2024-31384|2024-04-15T10:13:43.365Z -- rara%20theme -- spa%20and%20salon
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Rara Theme Spa and Salon.This issue affects Spa and Salon: from n/a through 1.2.7.
